body:
### Introducing   EASYmix   aka   EZmix.
You are going to enjoy and be amazed by this simple sound mixing tool.![pic](https://raw.github.com/mutatina/ezmix/master/media/ezmix.png)



### Requirements.
  MAC OS 10.6 +
  Only .wav and .aif sound files are  currently supported,.mp3 support is next.


### Developers
  If you like the project and you are a multimedia developer; animation,graphics,sound.
  Please contact  us,we would love to welcome your expertise.
  We are looking for max/msp developers,javascript,c++, and most important:
  usability experts.



### Support / Contact
rnyonyi at falcon.bgsu dot edu
tagline: A simple DJ tool for the rest of us...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: EZmix
